newsitem.title: USA: PC Quote mulls strategic options.
newsitem.headline: PC Quote mulls strategic options.

text.p: PC Quote Inc said Thursday it hired William Blair & Co to help the company explore its strategic options, including a possible sale, merger, joint venture or other financing alternatives.
The company, which previously reported a loss of $1.1 million for the quarter that ended September 30 and a loss of $1.1 million for the nine months that ended September 30.
PC Quote, which provides on-line stock and market quotes, said it expects to report a greater loss for the fourth quarter of 1996 and a loss for the year ended December 31.
In December, the company announced its relationship with Charles Schwab Corp would end December 31 and that its relationship with Global Financial Services was substantially winding down.
PC Quote shares closed up 15/16 Thursday at 3-7/16.
